title: Global economic integration and cost decreases

content.question: Which of the following was the most immediate cause of global economic integration in the late twentieth and early twenty-first century?

choices.label: Increased dependence on cheap oil from the middle east
Population growth in the developing world
Decreases in the cost of long-distance communication and transportation
Regulation of air and water pollution in the developed world

content.answer: Decreases in the cost of long-distance communication and transportation

topic.text: 9.1: Advances in Technology and Exchange after 1900

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
